title: Combination of ozonation with GAC, AIX and biochar post-treatment for removal of pharmaceuticals and transformation products from municipal WWTP effluent
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00702F, Paper
Malhun Fakioglu, Oksana Golovko, Christian Baresel, Lutz Ahrens, Izzet Ozturk
Pharmaceuticals, transformation products, by-products and conventional parameters were monitored throughout the continous system.
